content:
this is a single endpoint from an open api spec document
it has been minified by removing unnecessary kvps
additionally common terms have been abbreviated  operationId: GetOrigins path: https://gateway.stackpath.com/delivery/v1/stacks/{stack_id}/origins content: params
name stackid
desc a stack id or slug
in path
required true
schema
type str
name pagerequestfirst
desc the number of items desired
in query
required false
schema
type str
name pagerequestafter
desc the cursor value after which data will be returned
in query
required false
schema
type str
name pagerequestfilter
desc sqlstyle constraint filters
in query
required false
schema
type str
name pagerequestsortby
desc sort the response by the given field
in query
required false
schema
type str
sum get all origins
desc retrieve all origins associated with a sites stack
responses
200
deliverygetoriginsresponse
type obj
props
paginationpageinfo
type obj
props
totalcount
type str
desc the total number of items in the dataset
haspreviouspage
type bool
format bool
desc whether or not a previous page of data exists
hasnextpage
type bool
format bool
desc whether or not another page of data is available
startcursor
type str
desc the cursor for the first item in the set of data returned
endcursor
type str
desc the cursor for the last item in the set of data returned
desc information about a paginated response

this is modeled after the graphql relay spec to support both cursor based pagination and traditional offset based pagination
results
type arr
schemadeliveryorigin
type obj
props
id
type str
desc an origins unique identifier
stackid
type str
desc the stack for which the origin belongs to
dedicated
type bool
format bool
desc whether or not an origin is dedicated to a cdn site

dedicated origins cannot be used by any site other than that to which it is dedicated
siteid
type str
desc the id of the cdn site to which an origin is dedicated
deliveryhttporigin
type obj
props
path
type str
desc the origins http request path
hostname
type str
desc the origins http request hostname
port
type integer
format int32
desc the origins http request port

set this to 0 to remove this value
secureport
type integer
format int32
desc the origins https request port

set this to 0 to remove this value

type obj

props

type str
desc the username to be used when authenticating with the origin
password
type str
desc the password to be used when authenticating with the origin
desc basic http authentication

type obj
props
accesskey
type str
desc the access key
secretkey
type str
desc the secret key
desc secret key authentication
desc an origins authentication method
verifycertificate
type bool
format bool
desc verify the origins ssl certificate when requesting from the origin
certificatecommonname
type str
desc the commonname to validate ssl origin requests from this value needs to be provided when enabling verifycertificate
desc an http origin

desc the origin buckets name

desc the origin buckets region
